overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon It also analyzes reviews to verify trustworthiness             Top reviews   Most recent   Top reviews              Top reviews from the United States   There was a problem filtering reviews right now Please try again later Captain Swanky Pants1 0 out of 5 stars Complete dissappointment Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2014Verified Purchase  It looks great That's it The range is 10 feet at best and the jet that comes out is piddly: thin jet that has no impact on the person being shot Particularly disappointing is to see friends' kids with a $20 cheapie that shoots 3 times the distance and with a massive jet that really does give a soaking The battery power is a nice thought but the pump in this is underpowered and takes a second or two to fill the chamber Which means the other person hears the pump purging and makes a run for it!All up, this might impress a 5 year old but then   it's too big and clunky for a 5 year old to use I'm not sure what better options there are out there but I'm taking my time to check that I don't go buy another lemon and whether in fact Nerf have anything worth buying Save yourself the money and a heap of disappointment and go get a blaster with a larger jet and greater distance   Read more 2 people found this helpful  Helpful   Report abuse A Kaelin5 0 out of 5 stars My son age 9 loves this gun Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2013Verified Purchase  The only trouble I have with this gun is that it is unfair to the others who do not have an automatic water gun!
My son made this gun more troublesome by buying Nerf's water gun backpack Now he never seems to run out of water while the rest of us are running around to refill ours!!!
Now I need to buy one!
Have fun!

Read more   Helpful   Report abuse 6iscrazy4 0 out of 5 stars HEAVY WHEN FULL Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2013Verified Purchase  When I got this I was so excited until I tried It out The thing was so darn heavy when I filled it with water I couldn't make any quick getaways or even run That was the downside but the shield was an awesome attachment I could protect my face and It could shoot a lot longer that the others The removable stock balanced it out Overall this would be hard to use for a little kid but bigger kids would have a blast   Read more One person found this helpful  Helpful   Report abuse M R 4 0 out of 5 stars Fun Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2015Verified Purchase  Super fun The water just seems to run out quickly because it's being discharged so fast   Read more   Helpful   Report abuse Imanni R 5 0 out of 5 stars Five Stars Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2017Verified Purchase  Great product  Read more   Helpful   Report abuse nativevlan5 0 out of 5 stars Nice loves to shoot the other kids (and adults) with    Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2015Verified Purchase  Nice loves to shoot the other kids (and adults) with this thing Holds a good bit of water, more shooting time between refills than I would have thought   Read more   Helpful   Report abuse sponges5 0 out of 5 stars wow!!!
Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2012Verified Purchase  this gun is simply   WOW!!!
this gun is amaazing!!!
it shoots a good 20 25ft and omg it holds lots and lots and lots of water!!!

i like how the drum mag is also compatable with my tornado strike gun as well i like how there is no pumping involved this gun is a good gun if your on the run cause  you can run and pull the trigger at the same time to slow your enemy down i originally got this gun for my sis because its too hard for her to pump and she loves it my sis is 8 years old and its hard for her to carry the gun with the huge clip so  got some of the regular sized clips and now she loves it even more the only draw back to this gun is that if your enemy gets a hold of this gun then your screwed!!!
have fun!!!!!

column3: and its detachable shield     Contents  1 Details  1 1 Official description   2 Gallery 3 Official videos 4 References 5 External links   Details The Lightningstorm is a battery-operated clip-fed soaker powered by "PowerSoak Technology"
column4: similar to the Thunderstorm It is compatible with Nerf removable shoulder stocks and features a small tactical rail on top of the soaker   Official description CollapseThis is an official description from Hasbro com Please do not modify it (view the archived product listing)  Hit your target with the motorized soaking power of the LIGHTNING-STORM blaster With its super-sized water drum and detachable stock
